title: Scarron's novels ... rendred into English, with some additions, by John Davies ...
author: Scarron, Monsieur, 1610-1660.
notes: Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
(from t.p.) The fruitless precaution -- The hypocrites -- The innocent adultery -- The judge in his own cause --  The rival-brothers -- The invisible mistress -- The chastisement of avarice.
